Review.Titre: This platform doesn't worth it and cheating their consumers

Very poor!I signed about 6 months ago on a special 50 percent off price.Used it for that month and no longer needed it afterwards so cancelled.6 months later I'm being charged over £80 for a software I've not used for months or intend to use!I emailed them to ask for a refund and was refused.Reason given were that I had 'paused' my account and I would have received an email before the activation, which both are straight lies!This seems to be a very common complaint about this company aswell.They have either got a problem with the software they use that is placing people's accounts on pause when they're cancelling or it's just straight fraud.I have also explained that the money taken was for my food, I cannot eat now until a couple of weeks.I'm currently on disability benefits and that charge had taken they money I had to buy my groceries.I've explained this again to their customer service and I've basically just been told tough luck, what a lovely way to treat people ey!

Review.Titre: Swindlers! Don't give them your Credit Card
Review.Contenu: I regret not checking reviews for this company before I signed up. Do yourself a favor, DO NOT sign up for any paid Helium 10 plans!  Helium 10 is an unethical company with onerous policies and little care for their customers. Once you sign up for what you assume is a monthly subscription, they will hold you hostage and continue billing you for several months -- even if you are not using the service or attempt to cancel at renewal. They don't communicate their policies in your confirmation email or invoice and actually disable self-serve ability to cancel from their own website. I've never seen anything quite like it. A lot of amazon FBA influencers get paid to shill for Helium 10 and offer promo codes to their community. I fell for it, but even at 50% off the service is trash and they make money by charging customers who want to leave. Trust me, try Jungle Scout or AMZSkout instead.Update: they posted a response, i reached out to Sean and no one replied. they don't care to fix any issues just pretend that they are opening up the channel of communications. What a joke!BEWARE OF 5 STAR REVIEWS. THESE ARE PEOPLE WHO GET HELIUM 10 FOR FREE, AND HELIUM 10 ASKED THEM TO LEAVE POSITIVE REVIEW TO DROWN REAL ONES....

Clearly, this is a scam. Listen to the other reviewers. First, I signed up to use the software but it does not work at advertised. Once you reach out to Customer Service they respond so quickly making you think they're actually going to help you. The problem is, they don't know anything. So they always have to toss your question down the line. That's where the fun comes in. You have to wait a month or two after that to get a response. All that time waiting to only find out they can't and won't fix the problem. So they string me on for two months of subscription, they did offer a pro-rated refund but then hit me with another $80 bill afterword saying that I used Adtomic which was advertised as being included in the Diamond Package. Turns out... it's not. It's a COMPLETE scam. Jungle Scout is just as bad, but at least you pay for what you get over there.

While I initially had high hopes for the overall product, my recent experience with Hellium 10's customer support left me feeling quite disappointed.I encountered a tech issue with the inventory level that persisted for over a month. Despite relying solely on Hellium 10 for inventory checking during this time, the problem remained unresolved. I reached out to customer support and requested to pause my subscription until the issue was fixed, but unfortunately, I was still charged for August.The agent handling my case failed to mention that pausing the subscription was something I needed to do on my end, which added to the confusion. When I asked for a refund due to the oversight, I was politely declined, which was disheartening.The communication process also felt slow, as I was instructed to wait until the issue was resolved before the billing team could address the situation. In comparison to other companies, the response time was longer, which made the experience less smooth than I had hoped.While my intention was to pause my subscription temporarily, I ultimately decided to cancel it due to the unfortunate customer support experience.I sincerely hope that Hellium 10 takes this feedback constructively and works on improving their customer support services. With better communication and prompt resolutions, I believe they can provide a more satisfactory experience for their users.

Review.Titre: Most Tools don't work, especially the important ones
Review.Contenu: I was looking for an alternative for another PPC tool I was using.  I heard about Helium10 for years, and noticed they had a tool called Adtomic for PPC. They also offered a swiss army knife of other tools for a reasonable price, so I decided to give it a try. Thought I can save money, and consolidate all my other tools and just use Helium10.The account executive and support team were great. But, the tools just failed to live up to their claims on the website. The PPC tool started automating campaigns (when I didn't even turn it on for that campaign), the profit module failed to import all info (even after 72 hours of connection, which was ample time for them...stated by their CS), PPC info overall was incomplete and unreliable for my use. The keyword tools results gave alot of weird answers and not many relevant answers compared to more mature tools like junglescout. (I was planning on cutting JS if Helium10 performed similarly).The live chat people are responsive, but they are just trouble ticket makers and front-end staff. The development teams and internal teams do nothing to fix the issuesm promptly, leaving the CS people and account reps with nothing to say but sorry, the teams aren't responding for some reason. None of my tickets were resolved before I decided to cancel.Helium10 is not ready for prime time. The dev teams and some tools are not working as advertised. I am not sure why, but it's not worth trying them out until ALL tools are fixed and working. Great potential, but they need to go back to the drawing board, the dev teams seem to be drowning in tickets to just leave my issues hanging with no response or updates. I always heard great things about them, so I wonder if they are just dropping the ball now....Neways, looking for another tool! If they fix everything, I would give them a try again...but looking at other reviews, not sure when that will happen

Review.Titre: Great tool with room for  improvement
Review.Contenu: Helium 10 provides a plethora of tools that help businesses in the different phases of the product life cycle from research, to competitive analysis, to ongoing maintenance of product positioning in the market. The user interface is reasonably user friendly and the company keeps a cadence of innovation introducing new tools and features. Where it is lacking, is on the analysis side so we end up collecting data from Helium 10 and others and do the deep big data analysis of keywords, search terms, and such in external tools.Bottom line, it is a 3.5 stars solution that I believe will get better overtime.
